name: color-scheme-generator
description:
The repository contains simple color scheme generator project from Scrimba's "The Frontend Developer Career Path".
To see the app please visit: https://maypaw.github.io/scrimba-solo-project_color-scheme-generator/ ### What's a "solo" project? A "solo" project on Scrimba is a kind of task that students complete by themselves, with basic reqirements
and Figma design provided. The teachers always encourage students to make improvements to the project.
